attributes.name: Agriculture Research Utilization
attributes.description: Increase the utilization of Departmental research results into real world technology improvements to USDA customers, producers, and industry.

attributes.name: Improve Customer Experience and Operational Efficiency
attributes.description: Enhance the customer experience for farmers, ranchers, and foresters through operational efficiencies and expansion of service delivery channels.

attributes.name: Reduce Animal Disease
attributes.description: To effectively control the spread of animal diseases, USDA supports animal health professionals and other agency partners who use identification technology to quickly trace potentially diseased animals.

attributes.name: Reduce Consumer Risk from Regulated Products through Modernization
attributes.description: The Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) will reduce consumer risk from FSIS-regulated products by systematically controlling and preventing hazards through the use of modernized systems, policies, and scientific approaches.

attributes.name: Rural Connectivity
attributes.description: Create and implement innovative solutions to rural connectivity by expanding broadband infrastructure and services.

attributes.name: Conduct a Complete and Accurate 2020 Decennial Census
Increase the Economic Impact of U.S. Trade
attributes.description: The Department of Commerce International Trade Administration (ITA) supports jobs for American workers and strengthens U.S. economic and national security by facilitating U.S. exports and inward investment.

attributes.name: Mitigate Flood Impacts by Demonstrating Improved Decision Support Services to Emergency Managers
Rural Wireless Broadband for Public Safety
attributes.description: The Department of Commerce will increase the public’s safety by providing first responders with access to a nationwide wireless broadband network.

attributes.name: Space Situational Awareness
attributes.description: The increasing number of objects and participants in space present new threats that inhibit the growth of space commerce. To better track objects in orbit and predict where they will be at any given time, the Department of Commerce, as directed by the President per Space Policy Directive 3 and in partnership with the Department of Defense and the commercial industry, will coordinate the development and implementation of a modern space situational awareness (SSA) capability.

attributes.name: DoD Reform Savings
attributes.description: The Department will drive transformational improvements of business processes, systems, and policies to increase effectiveness and performance while aligning and reprioritizing savings to support the National Defense Strategy (NDS).

attributes.name: Financial Management
attributes.description: Continue annual audits and use the resulting recommendations as feedback on implemented corrective actions and other improvement opportunities toward a positive/clean/unmodified audit opinion for the entire DoD.

attributes.name: Reduce Regulatory Burden
attributes.description: Reduce Regulatory Burden by eliminating unnecessary Federal Rules through continued implementation of Executive Order 13771.

attributes.name: Education Freedom
attributes.description: Improve awareness of and access to high-quality K-12 education opportunities for students and families.

attributes.name: Federal Student Aid Customer Service
attributes.description: Leverage the Next Generation Financial Services Environment (Next Gen FSA) to improve and personalize customers’ experience with Federal Student Aid (FSA).

attributes.name: Student Privacy and Cybersecurity
attributes.description: Improve student privacy and cybersecurity at institutions of higher education (IHEs) through outreach and compliance efforts.

attributes.name: Regulatory Reform
attributes.description: Provide regulatory relief to education stakeholders as necessary and appropriate.

attributes.name: Commercial Adoption of Energy Technologies
attributes.description: Enable increased commercial adoption and use of the broad suite of technologies and facilities developed and maintained by the Department of Energy through enhanced public-private and public-public partnerships.

attributes.name: Department of Energy (DOE) Enterprise Cybersecurity
attributes.description: Assess all Department high value assets/systems and implement mitigation strategies consistent with the risk to national security interests and the success of the DOE mission essential functions.

attributes.name: Energy Sector Cybersecurity
attributes.description: Identify, contain, and defeat cyber threats to our Nation’s energy delivery systems through a shared understanding between industry and government of adversarial techniques to mitigate energy sector cyber-attacks. DOE will have dramatically improved our National energy sector’s ability to identify, contain, and defeat cybersecurity threats.

attributes.name: Environmental Management
attributes.description: Achieve significant progress in cleaning up the radioactive and chemical contamination left behind by six decades of weapons production and energy research during the Manhattan Project and the Cold War. By September 30, 2021, advance treatment and disposition of waste and excess facilities.

attributes.name: High Performance Computing (Exascale/Artificial Intelligence)
attributes.description: To meet Administration priorities and sustain U.S. preeminence in the strategic area of high performance computing (HPC), which underpins national and economic security, develop and deliver the next generation of integrated HPC capability by engaging in research and development to create a capable exascale computing ecosystem that integrates hardware and software capability delivering at least 100 times the performance of current 10 petaflop (1015 floating point operations per second) systems across a range of applications representing government needs and societal priorities such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies.

attributes.name: Nuclear Stockpile Annual Assessment
attributes.description: Provide to the President of the United States the annual status of the U.S. nuclear weapons stockpile safety, security, reliability, and effectiveness to meet our nation’s goals of deterring adversaries and underpinning the Nation’s security.

attributes.name: Ending the HIV Epidemic
attributes.description: End the HIV epidemic by reducing new HIV infections through 1) linking people to HIV medical care as quickly as possible so that treatment can be initiated; and 2) preventing HIV through prescribing pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) to those who have indications for PrEP.

attributes.name: Kidney Care
attributes.description: Reduce morbidity and mortality associated with end-stage renal disease and increase patient choice by improving access to alternatives to center-based dialysis.

attributes.name: Reducing Opioid Morbidity and Mortality
attributes.description: Reduce opioid-related morbidity and mortality through: 1) improving access to prevention, treatment and recovery support services; 2) targeting the availability and distribution of overdose-reversing drugs; 3) strengthening public health data and reporting; 4) supporting cutting-edge research; and 5) advancing the practice of pain management.

attributes.name: Enhance Border Security
attributes.description: Improve security along the U.S. borders between ports of entry with emphasis on the southwest border.

attributes.name: Strengthen Federal Cybersecurity
attributes.description: Protect federal networks by defending against threats and assisting agencies in managing risk.

attributes.organization_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
attributes.name: Enhance Rental Assistance

attributes.organization_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
attributes.name: Promote Economic Opportunity for HUD-Assisted Residents
attributes.description: Promote economic opportunity for HUD-assisted residents by encouraging self-sufficiency and financial stability

attributes.organization_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
attributes.name: Protect Families from Lead-Based Paint and Other Health Hazards

attributes.organization_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
attributes.name: Reduce the Average Length of Homelessness
Conduct Facility-Based Risk Inspections and Performance-Based Risk Inspections
Undertake Fuels Management Projects To Reduce Wildfires
Improve Processing of Drilling Applications
attributes.description: Extracting oil and gas resources on public lands improves our energy security, drives economic growth, and provides revenues collected on behalf of the American public.

attributes.name: Combat Cyber-Enabled Threats and Attacks
attributes.description: Cybercrime is one of the greatest threats facing our country, and has enormous implications for our national security, economic prosperity, and public safety. The range of threats and challenges cybercrime presents for law enforcement expands just as rapidly as technology evolves.

attributes.name: Combat the Opioid Crisis
attributes.description: The opioid epidemic affects a broad cross-section of the United States population without regard for age, gender, race, ethnicity, or economic status. Communities across the United States, including those in rural, suburban, and urban jurisdictions, have been hit by the opioid epidemic.

attributes.name: Prevent and Disrupt Transnational Elder Fraud
attributes.description: Reduce the impact of transnational fraud schemes on older Americans. Through increased disruption and coordination among government and private stakeholders, and outreach to older Americans, the Department of Justice and its law enforcement partners will reduce the devastating effects of transnational elder fraud schemes.

attributes.name: Reduce Violent Crime, Specifically Gun Violence
attributes.description: Strengthen and recommit our efforts to reduce gun violence through the launch of Project Guardian.

attributes.name: Administration - Implement an Enterprise-Wide Shared Services Model
Worker Safety - Reduce Trenching and Excavation Hazards
IT Modernization
attributes.description: Enhance the effectiveness of the Department’s IT portfolio through increased productivity, usability, security, and transparency; ensuring that all IT services and solutions are aligned to the mission of the Department.

attributes.name: Category Management
attributes.description: Leverage common contracts to maximize cost-efficiency and standardization.

attributes.name: Data Informed Diplomacy
attributes.description: Advancing an enterprise data and analytics capability that enables cross-functional continuous insights, timely and transparent reporting, and evidence-based decision making at the Department of State.

attributes.name: Enhancing Security Monitoring Solutions
attributes.description: Update technical security countermeasures for the Department of State (DOS) facilities worldwide by enhancing security monitoring solutions paramount to securing Department of State personnel, information, and facilities.

attributes.name: HIV/AIDS
attributes.description: Achieve control of the HIV epidemic in focus countries.

attributes.organization_name: United States Agency for International Development
attributes.name: Effective Partnering and Procurement Reform
attributes.description: Empower development partners through collaborative and co-creative practices in acquisition and assistance.

attributes.organization_name: United States Agency for International Development
attributes.name: Maternal and Child Health
attributes.description: Advance the global effort to prevent child and maternal deaths.

attributes.organization_name: United States Agency for International Development
attributes.name: Private-Sector Engagement
attributes.description: Expand engagement with the private sector to achieve greater development outcomes.

attributes.organization_name: United States Agency for International Development
attributes.name: Resilience and Food Security
attributes.description: Increase long-term resilience and food security to reduce hunger and the need for emergency humanitarian assistance.

attributes.name: Enhance Commercial Space Innovation
attributes.description: Develop and implement Time-Based Launch/Reentry Procedures (TBLP) and Dynamic Launch/Reentry Windows (DLRW) for integrating Cape Canaveral Air Force Station/Kennedy Space Center (CCAFS/KSC) launch complex commercial space launch and reentry operations into the National Airspace System (NAS).

attributes.name: Improve America’s Transportation-Related Infrastructure
attributes.description: Improve the conditions of the Federally-funded portions of the Nation’s transportation systems.

attributes.name: Increase Aviation Safety
attributes.description: Increase aviation safety for the flying public.

attributes.name: Reduce Surface Transportation-Related Fatalities
attributes.description: Reduce overall surface transportation-related fatalities.

attributes.name: Implementation of the Foreign Investment Risk Review Modernization Act of 2018 (FIRRMA)
attributes.description: Successful implementation of the Foreign Investment Risk Review Modernization Act of 2018 (FIRRMA) will ensure that identified national security risks arising from certain foreign investments—including from some types of investments and transactions that previously fell outside of Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States’ (CFIUS) jurisdiction—are addressed in an effective manner. By September 30, 2021, the Department of the Treasury, as Chair of the CFIUS program, will implement key elements of FIRRMA.

attributes.name: Paper Check Reduction
attributes.description: Create a modern, seamless, and cost-effective Federal payment experience for Americans

attributes.name: Decision Reviews and Appeals
attributes.description: Provide claimants who disagree with VA’s decisions on benefits claims and appeals with timely reviews under the new, streamlined process authorized by the Veterans Appeals Improvement and Modernization Act of 2017.

attributes.name: Suicide Prevention
attributes.description: Through Clinical and Community strategies, VHA will proactively identify and provide interventions for at-risk Veterans, both those using VHA care and those using other care systems, to prevent suicide and overdose death.

attributes.name: Telehealth/Connected Care
attributes.description: Improve Veterans' access to quality healthcare using digital care delivery methods.

attributes.name: Veteran’s Experience with VA.gov
attributes.description: VA will measure and improve Veteran Experience with VA.gov using the government-wide drivers identified for measuring customer experience (CX) with the Federal Government.

attributes.name: Accelerate the pace of cleanups and return sites to beneficial use in their communities
Empower communities to leverage EPA water infrastructure investments
Improve air quality by reducing the number of areas not meeting air quality standards
Reduce childhood lead exposures and associated health impacts
Reduce per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) risks to the public
Leased Building Operations
attributes.description: GSA will achieve savings for the taxpayer by negotiating leases below average market rates by engaging in longer lease terms, when they allow GSA to obtain more favorable rates and conditions; increasing the use of the force multiplier tools, both the Automated Advanced Acquisition Program (AAAP) and the GSA Leasing Support (GLS) services contract; and, timely replacement of expiring leases.

attributes.name: Multiple Award Schedule Reform - Schedules Consolidation
attributes.description: As part of GSA’s Federal Marketplace strategy to make the Government buying and selling experience easy, efficient, and modern.

attributes.name: Commercial Low Earth Orbit Economy
attributes.description: Enable a robust commercial low Earth orbit economy in which transportation, habitation, and on-orbit services are available for purchase by NASA and other customers.

attributes.name: Artemis 2024 Lunar Landing
attributes.description: Advance America’s goal to land the first woman and the next man on the Moon by 2024 and pursue a sustainable program of exploration by demonstrating capabilities that advance lunar exploration.

attributes.name: Enable Sustainable Surface Capabilities for the Moon in preparation for Mars
attributes.description: Commence lunar surface science investigations, technology, and exploration demonstrations to enable a sustainable lunar surface exploration strategy.

attributes.name: James Webb Space Telescope
attributes.description: Revolutionize humankind's understanding of the cosmos and humanity’s place in it. The James Webb Space Telescope will study every phase in the history of our universe, ranging from the first luminous glows after the Big Bang, to the formation of other stellar systems capable of supporting life on planets like Earth, to the evolution of our own solar system.

attributes.name: Developing an Agency-Wide Partnerships Strategy
attributes.description: Strategically engage in public and private partnerships to enhance the impact of NSF’s investments and contribute to American economic competitiveness and security.

attributes.name: Federal Strategic Human Capital Management Tools, Flexibilities, and Authorities and Strategic Skill Gaps Mitigation
attributes.description: Enable agencies to effectively address current and projected workforce needs to meet mission objectives.

attributes.name: Establish an FEHB Master Enrollment Index
attributes.description: Establish an FEHB Master Enrollment Index.

attributes.name: Increase Access to Capital for Small Businesses through Enhancements in Web-Based Technology
Increase US Small Business Export Sales
Maximize Small Business Participation in Government Contracting
Improve Hearings Pending
attributes.description: Improve customer service in the hearings process by prioritizing those individuals who have waited the longest for a hearing decision.

attributes.name: Improve Supplemental Security Income Payment Accuracy
attributes.description: Improve the integrity of the Supplemental Security Income (SSI) program by focusing our efforts on reducing overpayments (Annual Targets Only).

attributes.name: Improve the National 800 Number Service
attributes.description: Improve the customer experience by reducing the Average Speed of Answer on the National 800 Number.

attributes.organization_name: United States Agency for International Development
attributes.name: Category management
attributes.description: Leverage common contracts to maximize cost-efficiency and standardization.

attributes.name: Expand human knowledge through new scientific discoveries
Extend human presence deeper into space and to the moon for sustainable long-term exploration and utilization
Extend human presence deeper into space and to the moon for sustainable long-term exploration and utilization
Address national challenges and catalyze economic growth
